nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in sea mount test case.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_layer_type
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls the vertical coordinate initializaton

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_stratification_type
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls how the vertical profile of tracers. See Beckmann and Haidvogel 1993 eqn 15-16.

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_coef_linear
nml_option.description: Density coefficient for linear vertical stratification

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_coef_exp
nml_option.description: Density coefficient for exponential vertical stratification

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_gradient_linear
nml_option.description: Density gradient for linear vertical stratification, $\Delta_z \rho$ in Beckmann Haidvogel eqn 15

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_gradient_exp
nml_option.description: Density gradient for exponential vertical stratification, $\Delta_z \rho$ in Beckmann Haidvogel eqn 16

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_depth_linear
nml_option.description: Density reference depth for linear vertical stratification

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_depth_exp
nml_option.description: Density reference depth for exponential vertical stratification

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_ref
nml_option.description: Density reference for eos to initialize temperature

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_Tref
nml_option.description: Reference temperature for eos to initialize temperature

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_density_alpha
nml_option.description: Linear thermal expansion coefficient to initialize temperature

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the sea mount test case.

nml_option.name: config_sea_mount_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.
